contents.text: Thank you for calling Ridecell in San Francisco, the world’s most intelligent mobility platform.
For sales, partnership opportunities, and account setup, press 1.
If you’re interested in fleet management solutions, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a fleet management specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to discuss setting up Ridecell’s fleet management solution for our company vehicles.
I want to set up and manage a fleet for my veteran-focused transport service.
I need to discuss deployment architecture for Ridecell's fleet management across our electric scooter network.
I’m calling to set up a small vehicle fleet for my senior center and need help with the account setup.
I want to set up a fleet management account for my university’s autonomous drone research project.

contents.text: If you’d like information on pricing and custom quotes, press 2.
One moment please while we route you to our pricing and quotes team.

navigationGoals: I’d like to get a customized pricing quote for deploying Ridecell across our operations.
I’d like pricing details and a custom quote for the fleet management solution I need.
I need a custom pricing quote for scaling our autonomous shuttle fleet with dynamic pricing capabilities.
I’d like to get a cost estimate for your fleet management service tailored to a small operation.
I need a custom quote for using Ridecell’s platform in our campus microtransit pilot study.

contents.text: For technical support and service inquiries, press 2.
If you need help with platform setup or operations, press 1.
Please stay on the line while we forward you to technical support.

navigationGoals: I need assistance configuring and launching our Ridecell platform for daily use.
I need help configuring and launching the Ridecell platform for my operations.
I need help resolving Kubernetes deployment errors during our Ridecell platform setup.
Could you guide me through logging into and using the platform step by step?
I need help with platform setup to monitor test vehicle operations.

contents.text: If you have questions about API integration or developer support, press 2.
Thank you for holding, we’ll connect you to our developer support team shortly.

navigationGoals: I need support integrating the Ridecell API with our existing backend systems.
I need developer support to integrate our custom app with Ridecell’s APIs.
I need developer assistance integrating Ridecell's API via OAuth2 for real-time telemetry ingestion.
I need assistance connecting your API to my scheduling software, as I’m not very technical.
I need assistance integrating the Ridecell API into our research simulation pipeline.
